info.title: Buildium Women in Technology Scholarship
info.summary: Awards one $2,500 scholarship each semester to a woman who can explain which female leader most inspires them to pursue their dreams, and why.

info.title: Submission Deadlines:
info.summary: Fall 2019 Scholarship applications open on October 1st and close on November 1st. Spring scholarship rotation opens on March 15, 2020 and closes on April 15, 2020.
